title: 16 Bit Battle Music Pack
description: 22 authentic 16/32-bit console style royalty free songs! Perfect for retro RPGs!
longDescription:
Unleash the Power of Nostalgia with My Authentic 16 Bit Battle Pack

Are you ready to transport your players back to the golden age of gaming? Dive into an era of 16-bit wonder with my meticulously crafted 16-Bit Battle Music Pack, designed specifically for games featuring that retro pixel art style. Whether your game is action-packed or turn-based, this collection of mesmerizing tracks will elevate your gaming experience to a whole new level.


Immerse Your Players in Epic Battles

Picture this: your heroes stand ready for battle, the tension is palpable, and the fate of the realm hangs in the balance. What's missing? The perfect soundtrack to set the tone for an unforgettable showdown. My 16-Bit Battle Music Pack delivers just that. With each track meticulously composed to capture the essence of the 16 and 32 bit eras, your players will be fully immersed in the heart-pounding excitement of every encounter.


Loopable Tracks for Endless Adventures

Tired of abrupt music transitions that disrupt the gaming flow? Fret not! My tracks are seamlessly loopable, ensuring that the musical ambiance never falters, even during prolonged battles or exploration. Your players will be drawn deeper into the world you've created, thanks to the flawless looping of my music.


Versatile Styles for Every RPG Genre

Whether your game is a fast-paced action RPG or a methodical turn-based adventure, my 16-Bit Battle Music Pack has you covered. Each track is carefully designed to match various gameplay styles, providing the perfect backdrop for both intense combat and strategic decision-making. Create an immersive experience that resonates with your players, making every battle a memory they won't soon forget.


Why Choose My 16-Bit Battle Music Pack?

  • Authentic 16-Bit Style: Immerse players in the nostalgia of the 16-bit era with music that pays homage to classic RPGs.
  • Pixel Art Aesthetics: Enhance the visual charm of your pixel art game with music that complements its unique style.
  • Seamless Looping: Enjoy continuous and uninterrupted music that matches both battles and exploration segments.
  • Versatility: Designed for action RPGs and turn-based games alike, my tracks adapt to your gameplay style.
  • Affordable Excellence: Unlock the magic of my 16-Bit Battle Music Pack at an accessible price, without compromising on quality.


Don't Miss Out on an excellent RPG Soundtrack!

Elevate your game to legendary status with the immersive power of my 16-Bit Battle Music Pack. Transform your battles into epic symphonies and your players into true heroes. Whether you're a seasoned developer or just starting your journey, my music pack will add that extra layer of enchantment to your creation.

Grab your copy now to experience the magic for yourself and bring your pixel art RPG to life in ways you never thought possible. Don't wait, let the battles begin!


Listen before you buy here:

https://audiomack.com/bit-by-bit-sound/album/16-bit-battle-music-pack

Features:

Tracklist

1. I've Got Your Back!

6. Battle Mage

7. Deadly Beauty

10. It's Bossin Time

11. Clashing Forces

12. Tournament Battle

13. Knights of Honor

14. Hold The Line

15. Evil Collides

16. Speed of Sound Showdown

17. Fighting a Giant Monster in a Cave

18. To Suffer a Loss (Game Over)

19. Victorious (Fanfare)

20. How Did We Do (Aftermath)

21. Final Showdown

22. Duel of the Dark Knight


  •  Royalty Free
  •  Authentic 16-Bit Sound
  •  Loopable


Number of Audio Wavs: 27 (separate intro's and loops for select songs)

Number of Audio Cues: 27 (separate intro's and loops for select songs)

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 30:03

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: Link (or a description of where users can find) the documentation

Important/Additional Notes: All music is original and written by Bert Cole.
